tasks.title: Research project requirements
tasks.description: Gather information about the new client project and identify key deliverables.

tasks.title: Create wireframes for homepage
tasks.description: Design initial wireframes for the client homepage based on the project brief.

tasks.title: Setup development environment
tasks.description: Install necessary dependencies and configure the development environment.

tasks.title: Design system components
tasks.description: Create reusable design components that align with the brand guidelines.

tasks.title: Client consultation meeting
tasks.description: Schedule and prepare for the initial client consultation to discuss project scope.
